category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AWC_Autosave
preference.preference_description: Controls automatically saving individual property edits. Applies to edits made in table cells only. Valid values are: * true: The edits are committed as soon as a user navigates away from the table cell. This is the default value. * false: The user must explicitly save any edits using the Save Edits command or discard any edits using the Cancel Edits command.
